item.title: Increasing the minimum amount for garnishments
item.description: It can feel overwhelming trying to understand the numerous ways to calculate garnishments across different agencies. While the standard garnishment feature in Dynamics GP works well for single garnishments, more complex scenarios with multiple garnishments often necessitate the use of the Greenshades Garnishments module. Let’s explore what Dynamics GP can handle independently. A recent example involved these requirements: The initial $150 of the employee’s eligible earnings are exempt from garnishment. If earnings fall between $150 and $200, only the amount exceeding $150 is subject to garnishment.
